metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0114 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Out of bounds memory access in Blink Serial API in Google Chrome prior to97.0.4692.71 allowed a remote attacker to perform an out of bounds memoryread via a crafted HTML page and virtual serial port driver.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
